A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Ignore all of the ridiculous 1/2 and 1 star reviews from the angry\, shouting\, so called "hardcore fans"  Nothing that happens in these new movies will ever please them so their opinions really don't matter to the vast majority who absolutely LOVED this movie! 
It had everything I want from Star Wars\, likeable characters\, great locations\, fantastic action scenes\, plenty of questions answered whilst creating just as many other mysteries to ponder and a lot of throwbacks and nods to fans of the original series including a very nice touch in an emotional late scene. 
The film is also beautifully shot\, one of the final scenes involving red soil being ripped up by small ships in a formation was just amazing to watch. 
Ignore the basement dwellers hating this\, they'll never be happy with a new vision/direction for Star Wars so they'll continue to piss and moan whilst masturbating to their old Princess Leia action figures.

Go see this movie and enjoy!
